summary: The implementation successfully addresses all 5 requirements. Backend storage and CRUD API methods for banner messages with admin authorization are implemented. The MarqueeBanner component displays below the header with gold/beige styling and horizontal scrolling. The admin dashboard includes a BannerManagement interface with add, edit, delete, reorder, and enable/disable controls. The component is integrated into the Layout.

hallucinated_features.description: Pause-on-hover functionality in MarqueeBanner CSS animation
hallucinated_features.reason: The CSS includes animation-play-state paused on hover which pauses the scroll animation when users hover over the banner. This interaction was not specified in the BuildRequest.
